channel.title: Introduction on Shiyu Jin's Personal Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on Shiyu Jin's Personal Homepage

item.title: Introduction
item.description: I’m a robotic researcher at Baidu Research in Sunnyvale, California, focusing on Robotics Manipulation. I earned my Ph.D. from UC Berkeley in Dec 2021, supervised by Prof. Masayoshi Tomizuka. Additionally, I had the opportunity to work at Google X, Intrinsic, MERL, Fanuc. News 01/2024: Paper: Distributed Multi-agent Interaction Generation with Imagined Potential Games accepted by American Control Conference (ACC) 2024. 01/2024: I started as a Research Engineer in the Embodied AI team at Meta FAIR.
